overview: Web Designer Jason Wilson joined Blue Global Media in 2010 as a Web Designer. Wilson holds a bachelorâ€™s degree in game design from Collins College. Prior to joining Blue Global Media, Wilson worked as a graphic designer for a number of clients, including Jetset Magazine, Coyotes Athletic Centers and Swift Transportation. In his current role, Wilson is responsible for designing graphics for websites and landing pages, coding websites and assisting in web development applications.
